paragraphs.text: Sustaining Iran's regional ambitions at all costs.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: On December 7, Iranian President Hassan Rouhani announced a huge hike in military expenditure for the next fiscal year
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Though he described the budget presented to parliament as "cautious" and "tight"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: military spending is to rise by 33.5 percent, far above the six percent increase in the general budget
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: This will likely result in a greater military footprint in the region, particularly in Syria and Iraq
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: where Iranian troops are directly involved in combat, training, logistics and intelligence-gathering
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: (Tehran this week expanded its operations in Iraq to include air strikes)
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: It is also likely meant as a show of strength and defiance against Iran's regional rivals
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it is doubtful that Tehran can economically sustain its existing regional military commitments, let alone expand them
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Crippling sanctions and a massive drop in oil prices mean a much larger military budget will put further strain on the economy
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: which has reportedly shrunk by 8.6 percent over the past two fiscal years
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: Furthermore
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the new budget might not be "cautious" enough
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: While
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it is based on oil being $70 per barrel
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: the price has fallen to under $70, with predictions that it will hover around $65 for the next several months, and perhaps slump even further
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: This is worrying news for the government
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: whose revenues are largely dependent on oil
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In addition
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: western sanctions have caused Iran's oil exports to plummet compared with a few years ago
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Last year, the oil minister said the fall in exports was costing the country up to $8bn each month
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Iran reportedly lost some $26bn in oil revenue in 2012
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: Sanctions and falling oil revenues have hurt the value of Iran's currency, and caused inflation to rise considerably
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: There has been an easing of sanctions in light of negotiations over Iran's nuclear programme
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it is limited
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Given that the talks have been extended by several months, the bulk of the sanctions will remain in place at least until then, with no indication as yet that a deal is within reach
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Sanctions could be reinstated or increased
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the talks fail
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: All this amounts to an economy that cannot keep up with Iran's regional ambitions
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The hike in military spending may arouse domestic anger
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it is seen by Iranians as spurred by foreign ventures
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: which is already a cause of increasing frustration, particularly with regard to propping up the Syrian regime
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: While
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Tehran is secretive about the extent of its military and financial assistance to its regional allies
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: there is a consensus that it has been a considerable economic drain, not least because of the long-term nature of these commitments
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Tehran's direct military involvement in Iraq is viewed by many Iranians as necessary to stop the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) from reaching its borders
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: there are reports of growing unease, among the public and within government, about the accumulating burden of propping up Bashar al-Assad in Syria, with no end in sight to a conflict that is entering its fourth year
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Given the current economic climate, it may be harder for Iran and Russia - which is also hurting under western sanctions and low oil prices- to sustain the war of attrition in Syria than for Assad's opponents
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: While
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the latter are also affected by falling oil prices
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: they are not under sanctions
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Furthermore
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: according to the International Monetary Fund, Iran and Russia need a much higher oil price to balance their budgets than Arab Gulf states, key backers of Syrian rebels
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Given this, and Arab Gulf states' large cash reserves and funds, they can absorb low oil prices for longer
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Saudi Arabia has relatively low production costs
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the US is enjoying a boom in shale oil
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Iran's oil revenue reserve fund, on the other hand, has reportedly been drained
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Government spokesman Mohammad Baqer Nobakht accused "some so-called Islamic countries in the region" of"serving the interests of America and [other] arrogant powers in trying to squeeze the Islamic Republic"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Rouhani has spoken of a "political conspiracy by certain countries"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Other Iranian officials have specifically pointed the finger at Saudi Arabia
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Regional political calculations may have been behind the decision by Riyadh and its Arab Gulf neighbours to stop the recent OPEC meeting from deciding to cut oil output to shore up prices
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The intention may be to curb Iran's regional power, and to weaken its negotiating position over its nuclear programme
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: over which the Gulf Cooperation Council has been very vocal in its concerns
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: other theories unrelated to Iran have been offered by analysts
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Gulf officials have spoken only of market forces rather than political considerations
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: In any case, the result is that for the foreseeable future, it will be increasingly costly for Tehran to maintain and extend its regional influence
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Its new budget defies this reality
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Iranians cannot, and should not, endure indefinite economic hardship
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They are less likely to tolerate such a situation if their sacrifices at home are paying for long-term military ventures abroad from which they see little tangible benefit
paragraphs.label: assumption
